des: To make a paper laptop, you should get two pieces of paper or cardstock in the color and size you want your laptop case to be. You also need  markers or colored pencils
name: Mst Smith

des: Now that you have your  your computer to be. On one of the sheets of paper, draw the logo of the computer brand you want to make.
name: Mst Jhoky

des: Measure and mark a one side of the white paper. Cut the one inch off of each side of the white sheet. Then, draw or attach the pictures you want to use as your desktop
name: Mst stara
